title: Romance of transportation
creator_credit: Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A light-hearted, whimsical look at the way an effective transportation system has been developed in Canada, despite the difficulties of vast distances and natural obstacles. An animated film by skilled animator Colin Low.
creator_credit_for_label: Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
